commit message:
* Added new drawer menu
* Added new gradle parameters for better compilation performance

* Changed header and category background color
* Fixed cooking & version/api issue when changing servers from the drawer menu
*  Added new drawer menu for the free version
*  Fixed  initial refresh from drawer menu
*  Fixed swipe refresh when choosing a server from Settings
*  Fixed not changing current server in drawer menu from Settings

*  Fixed wrong detection of not connection issue when changing servers
* Fixed wrong calling of RESULT_OK on Activity Result. Now it's called only when SETTING_CODE requestcode is invoked.

* Added transtion for Servers category on the drawer menu
* Changed how Options activity is called. Now it's invoked using the Task class
* Fixed java.lang.IllegalStateException: Fragment already added: ItemstFragment issue
*  Fixed swipe refresh issue in torrent details while updating
* Fixed java.lang.IllegalStateException: Fragment already added: aboutFragment issue (when rotaing in torrent details)

Release 4.1.8

* Added new drawer menu
* Fixed swipe refresh when choosing a server from Settings
* Fixed not changing current server in drawer menu from Settings
* Fixed wrong detection of not connection when changing servers
* Fixed java.lang.IllegalStateException: Fragment already added: ItemsFragment issue
* Fixed swipe refresh issue in torrent details while updating
* Fixed java.lang.IllegalStateException: Fragment already added: aboutFragment issue (when rotaing in torrent details)
* Increased torrent list item height
